TopicTitle: The old painful mod installation way.

Articles.Content: Anyone remember installing mods way back? Separating out the different folders, putting parts in parts, models in models, plugins in plugins, instead of the easy just drop one big folder into gamedata and you are set. When I think back to the old way I say to myself "How did I install 30+ mods back then without going insane".... It was even worse when the mod authors didn't make it completely obvious with what went where.
